name: Gregory DUNBAR, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Gregory DUNBAR, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 895
Gregory DUNBAR, Appellant v. Jeffrey BEARD, Secretary for the Department of Corrections, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 19, 2008.
